column4: are you guys getting the bug where your keyboard and mouse freeze for a couple minutes on startup?
so no one has this problem on 11.04?
when it starts again, run:  dmesg | tail     see if it gives clues
I saw it in Oneiric in Alpha2
what do you mean "when it starts again?"
well you say it freezes for a few minutes, so it recovers, right?
yep
so, is that it not 'starting again'?
the mouse, keyboard, and headset are off for a couple mins
basically all USB connections are off
momentarily
fine, but  do you see what I mean now?
i understand, thank you
you may want to make sure your BIOS is up to date
also I have not found a solution for my gpu issue
how do I "use" my driver, it says it is only activated
which gpu are you using?
GTX 260
I suggest you read through:  less /var/log/Xorg.0.log
you may need to run:  sudo nvidia-xconfig
it still says it's not in use, ActionParsnip
you need to reboot to apply the new settings
ok thanks.
